#How to Install the ESR patch

=How to use the ESR=
I publish this as a patch based on Percona-Server-5.5.15. I hope this can be merge into the main tree of Percona Server or MySQL Community Server ,so than i do not need maintain it at google code.

=== For Percona-Server-5.5.15 ===
  * Download [http://www.percona.com/downloads/Percona-Server-5.5/Percona-Server-5.5.15-21.0/source/ Percona-Server-5.5.15-rel21.0.tar.gz]
  * Checkout the patch from google code: [http://code.google.com/p/enhanced-semi-sync-replication/source/checkout Google Code SVN].
  * tar zxf Percona-Server-5.5.15-rel21.0.tar.gz
  * so:
{{{
$ls
Percona-Server-5.5.15-rel21.0 ESR.percona.5.5.15.patch
}}}
  * patch -p0 < ESR.percona.5.5.15.patch
  * Compile the Server: cmake . -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/opt/mysql  -DEXTRA_CHARSETS=all && make -j 8 && make install ...
  * configure the semi-sync with ***rpl_semi_sync_master_wait_before_commit=1*** in my.cnf ,so something like this:
{{{
## semi-sync master ##
plugin_load=rpl_semi_sync_master=semisync_master.so
rpl_semi_sync_master_enabled=1
rpl_semi_sync_master_timeout=5000
rpl_semi_sync_master_trace_level=32
rpl_semi_sync_master_wait_before_commit=1
}}}

=== For MySQL Community-Server-***5.5.16*** ===

it't the same as the Percona-Server. Of course, you should use [http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/mysql/ mysql-5.5.16.tar.gz] and ESR.MySQL.5.5.16.patch
